metadata.title: The Traveler's Stone
metadata.author: Rory's Adventure
metadata.description: A fantasy adventure where a young hero named Rory finds a mysterious stone that transports them to a magical realm.

instructions.loading: To run the game, load all chapter JSON files and combine them into a single scenes object. The game starts with the 'intro' scene.
instructions.save_format: Save files should contain the player's current state, including inventory, scores, and flags, along with the current scene ID.
instructions.game_structure: The game is organized in chapters for maintainability. This modular approach allows for easier updates and expansion of content.
